Well, I once went to London with my dad to spend a weekend there...
...and the hotel room was extremely small.
The information we'd got was misleading because on the web page,...
... the photos of the rooms, they looked a lot bigger.
In fact, they were so small that...
...you could just about open the door without hitting the bed.
It was really hot because it was the middle of summer, and it got really claustrophobic.
So, my dad complained to the manager, but he didn't even apologize.
We thought we deserved our money back and we were really upset.
